content: learn how to crochet this beautiful lace bookmark with this crochet pattern this is an easy crochet pattern that is easily customizable it is quick to work up and makes a great gift to a family member or friend even yourself a free copy of this pattern can be found on my ad supported blog https //richtexturescrochet com a free video tutorial for this pattern can be found on my youtube channel https //www youtube com/c/richtexturescrochet/ skill level easy gauge n/a finished size approximately 0 5 x 10 5 inches excluding tassel yarn patons grace® 100% mercerized cotton 1 75 oz 50 g 136 yds 125 m light weight 3 you will need approximately 20 yards hook size f/5 3 75 mm hook notions yarn needle
